title: UPDATE FAILED I can't install league

replies.body:
Update its unspecified error occured. please check logs for more information. 

any help ?

Since you put a new hard drive in, it's possible that your League install wasn't assigned proper system permissions. Because League interacts with a ton of files and software packages outside of the League directory, it really needs specific permissions in order to run properly. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) will walk you through common solutions for this issue. 

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.
